players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I have important information: Diana is the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest her now to protect the town."
You: "I want to hear from Diana before making any decisions."
Diana: "Diana is innocent. Bob is trying to shift blame without proof. Alice, focus on facts, not accusations."
You: "Bob, why are you so certain about Diana? Did you investigate her last night?"
Bob: "I did investigate Diana last night and found definitive proof that she is the mafioso. We cannot afford to hesitate; arresting her now is the only way to keep the town safe."
Diana: "I find Bob's accusation very suspicious. Why reveal investigation results so quickly without presenting any concrete proof? This feels like an attempt to rush the vote."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
